entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: PH single-day COVID-19 recoveries hit record high; cases now 9,485

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: PH single-day COVID-19 recoveries hit record high; cases now 9,485
media:group.media:description:
The single-day number of patients who have recovered from the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) hit a record high on Monday after the Department of Health (DOH) reported 101 new recoveries, bringing the total to 1,315.

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: 12 Senate employees test positive for COVID-19 prior to session

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: 12 Senate employees test positive for COVID-19 prior to session
media:group.media:description:
Twelve employees of the Senate yielded positive results in rapid tests for COVID-19 which were taken hours ahead of the resumption of session on Monday.

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Duterte orders PhilHealth not to require OFWs to pay premiums

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Duterte orders PhilHealth not to require OFWs to pay premiums
media:group.media:description:
Overseas Filipino workers will no longer be required to pay premiums to the Philippine Health Insurance Corp. (PhilHealth), presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said. The directive was issued by President Rodrigo Duterte who said OFWs should pay on a voluntary basis.

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: More than 100 people positive for COVID-19 in Tondo

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: More than 100 people positive for COVID-19 in Tondo
media:group.media:description:
Sa datos ng Manila Health Department, higit sa 100 ang nagpositive sa COVID-19 sa ginawang mass testing kahapon sa tinatayang 1,409 na pasyente mula sa Tondo 1, Manila.

media:group.media:title: UB: Jinggoy Estrada arrested for quarantine violations
media:group.media:description:
